attributes.action: to be no period 7 in any high school

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the number of periods the day is divided into are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Limit secondary schools days to 5.5 hours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612366
